<page title>: Avue AVG19WBV 3D 18 5" LED LCD Monitor 16 9 5 MS 1366 x 768 16 7 Million Colors | eBay
marketing information: The AVG19WBV-3D is a High Performance 18.5" LED Monitor specifically designed for Security Industry. With a Resolution of 1366 x 768 pixels this monitor displays High Quality video or computer signals via multiple inputs. This model improves over AVG19WBV-2D by featuring a 3D Comb Filter with De-Interlace and 3D Noise Reduction, better built-in stereo speakers, as well as the addition of an HDMI input. VGA and BNC connection ports and a Looping BNC input are also available. Certified by CE, FCC, and CB the monitor comes with lifetime usage rating of 50,000 hours. Other features include multi-language OSD (On-Screen Display) and In-Built Speakers.
